2. Test datasets

We provide six test datasets generated from using Illumina HumanMethylation450 (450K), MethylationEPIC v1.0 (850K), and MethylationEPIC v2.0.

2.1. Test data 1

Test data 1

Source

Mayo Clinic

Tissue

Blood

Platform

MethylationEPIC v1.0 (850K)

# of CpG

865859

# of samples

20

Age range (year)

(49, 82)

Data file

Test1_blood_N20_EPICv1_beta.tsv.gz

MD5 (Data file)

528a5896bcaae4a77757c35c7abcd507

Meta info file

Test1_blood_N20_EPICv1_info.tsv

(10, 60)
